item.description: If you are in the Boston area, please attend the "Justice for DJ Press Conference" at Noon on Thursday. It will be held at Unity Plaza in Dorchester, on the corner of Warren and Washington Streets. Please stand with us in solidarity as we denounce the Officer of the Year award given to Aaron Hess, the cop who shot and killed Danroy. Join us is expressing our collective disgust and outrage.
item.why: Show your solidarity with the family of Danroy Henry, the 20 year old Pace University student murdered by the NYPD on October 17, 2010, and with all victims of police brutality.
item.name: Justice for DJ Press Conference
